China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 31 日星期三 11:28:14 GMT 120
US says fentanyl talks with China 'meaningful' but more needs to be done-officialTalks between the U.S. and Chinese officials on stemming the flow of chemicals used for the production of deadly fentanyl have been "substantive" but "much more" needs to be done, the head of the White House delegation to Beijing said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:04:27 GMT UXX5QVAOSBIXXKWZARNXFZXT7A https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-fentanyl-talks-with-china-meaningful-more-needs-be-done-official-2024-01-31/Antoni Slodkowski世界
Apple set for modest iPhone sales growth, China worries remainApple iPhone sales likely rose 3% in the key holiday period, the best growth in five quarters, but analysts expect a tough year for the company in China, where it faces regulatory headwinds and resurgent competition from Huawei. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:02:20 GMT 4KJ52LPHOVPYTHZ3UG5WZTLFRA https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-set-modest-iphone-sales-growth-china-worries-remain-2024-01-31/Yuvraj Malik技术
Taiwan military simulates China turning drills into an attackTaiwan's military on Wednesday simulated a scenario where China suddenly turns one of its regular drills around the island into an actual attack, on the same day China staged another "combat readiness patrol" near Taiwan. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:37:27 GMT B4LLUS67O5PRJF7MOW6马拉蒂https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-military-simulates-china-turning-drills-into-an-attack-2024-01-31/Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
Chinese hackers are targeting US infrastructure, FBI chief to testifyHackers linked to the Chinese government are targeting critical infrastructure in the United States, preparing to cause "real-world harm" to Americans, FBI Director Christopher Wray plans to tell a House of Representatives panel on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:15:10 GMT I4YYTKHNUFNSHKT3WZ2F4QA3DI https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/chinese-hackers-are-targeting-us-infrastruct-fbi-chief-testify-2024-01-31/Andrew Goudsward技术网络安全
The logistics of war: How Washington is preparing for a Chinese invasion of TaiwanThe United States is increasingly worried that in the coming years Chinese President Xi Jinping could order his military to seize Taiwan. So the U.S. military is trying to play catch-up in a critical area: its logistics network. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:06:35 GMT YLTKK6MJLBM6HJ6KJWQMUEFN5I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/logistics-war-how-washington-is-preparing-chinese-invasion-taiwan-2024-01-31/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中国
Volkswagen founds AI lab, in talks with potential partnersVolkswagen is in talks with international technology firms about collaborating to create new digital prototypes for products and features using artificial intelligence, the carmaker said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:02:18 GMT HJ3QO743FBKU3AULUMFBS33W24 https://www.reuters.com/technology/volkswagen-founds-ai-lab-talks-with-pottial-partners-2024-01-31/Reuters技术
